15 #include <LSLLearning.hpp>

17 namespace tsa {
18 
19  LSLLearning::LSLLearning(unsigned int Order, double sigma, double lambda)
20  :
21  mOrder(Order + 1),
22  mSigma(sigma),
23  mLambda(lambda) {
24  mEF.resize(2, mOrder);
25  mEB.resize(2, mOrder);
26  mEpf.resize(2, mOrder);
27  mEpb.resize(2, mOrder);
28  mKf.resize(mOrder);
29  mKb.resize(mOrder);
30  mG.resize(mOrder);
31  mF0 = 0;
32  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < mOrder; k++) {
33  mEB(0, k) = 0.0;
34  mKf(k) = 0.0;
35  mKb(k) = 0.0;
36  mG(k) = 1.0;
37  mEpf(0, k) = sigma;
38  mEpb(0, k) = sigma;
39  }
40  mKf(0) = -sigma;
41  mKb(0) = -sigma;
42  }
43 
44  LSLLearning::~LSLLearning() {
45  }
46 
47  void LSLLearning::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, SeqViewDouble& WhitenedData) {
48  Dmatrix* in = InputData.GetData();
49  Dmatrix* out = WhitenedData.GetData();
50 
51  if ((in->size1() != out->size1()) || (in->size2() != out->size2())) {
52  out->resize(in->size1(), in->size2());
53  LogWarning("LSLLearning: resizing output view");
54  }
55 
56  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
57  execute(row(*in, r), row(*out, r));
58  }
59  WhitenedData.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
60  WhitenedData.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
61  }
62 
63  void LSLLearning::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, LatticeView& LatView) {
64  Dmatrix * in = InputData.GetData();
65  LogWarning("LSLLearning: the input data have been overwritten");
66 
67  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
68  execute(row(*in, r), row(*in, r));
69  }
70 
71  if (LatView.GetOrder() != GetOrder()) {
72  LatView.SetOrder(GetOrder());
73  LogWarning("LSLLearning: resizing Lattice view order");
74  }
75 
76  for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= GetOrder(); i++) {
77  LatView.SetParcorF(i, -GetParcorForward(i));
78  LatView.SetParcorB(i, -GetParcorBackward(i));
79  LatView.SetErrorForward(i, GetErrorForward(mF0, i));
80  LatView.SetErrorBackward(i, GetErrorBackward(mF0, i));
81  }
82  }
83 
84  void LSLLearning::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, Dvector& Parcor) {
85  Dmatrix * in = InputData.GetData();
86  LogWarning("LSLLearning: the input data have been overwritten");
87 
88  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
89  execute(row(*in, r), row(*in, r));
90  }
91 
92  if (Parcor.size() != (GetOrder() + 1)) {
93  Parcor.resize(GetOrder() + 1);
94  LogWarning("LSLLearning: resizing order of vector Parcor");
95  }
96  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Parcor.size(); i++) {
97  Parcor(i) = GetParcorForward(i);
98  }
99  }
100 
101  void LSLLearning::execute(matrix_row<Dmatrix> InputData, matrix_row<Dmatrix> OutputData) {
102 
103  unsigned int f_0 = mF0;
104  unsigned int f_1 = 1 - mF0;
105 
106  /*--Recursive relation-----------------------------------------------*/
107  unsigned int End = mOrder - 1;
108  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < InputData.size(); l++) {
109  mEB(f_1, 0) = InputData(l);
110  mEF(f_1, 0) = InputData(l);
111  mEpf(f_1, 0) = mLambda * mEpf(f_0, 0) + InputData(l) * InputData(l);
112  mEpb(f_1, 0) = mLambda * mEpf(f_0, 0) + InputData(l) * InputData(l);
113  mG(0) = 1.0;
114 
115  /*--------*/
116  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mOrder; k++) {
117  unsigned int t = k - 1;
118  mEpf(f_1, t) = mLambda * mEpf(f_0, t) + mG(t) * mEF(f_1, t) * mEF(f_1, t);
119  mEpb(f_1, t) = mLambda * mEpb(f_0, t) + mG(t) * mEB(f_0, t) * mEB(f_0, t);
120  mEF(f_1, k) = mEF(f_1, t) + mKf(k) * mEB(f_0, t);
121  mEB(f_1, k) = mEB(f_0, t) + mKb(k) * mEF(f_1, t);
122  mKf(k) = mKf(k) - mG(t) * mEB(f_0, t) * mEF(f_1, k) / mEpb(f_1, t);
123  mKb(k) = mKb(k) - mG(t) * mEF(f_1, t) * mEB(f_1, k) / mEpf(f_1, t);
124  mG(k) = mG(t) - (mG(t) * mG(t)) * (mEB(f_0, t) * mEB(f_0, t)) / mEpb(f_1, t);
125  }
126  OutputData(l) = mEF(f_1, End);
127  f_1 = 1 - f_1;
128  f_0 = 1 - f_0;
129  }
130  mSigma = mEpf(f_0, End - 1) / (InputData.size());
131  // mSigma = mEpf( f_0, End - 1 );
132  // --- Save the state of the filter
133  mF0 = f_0;
134  }
